#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000009
#define MAXN 100005
#define pi 3.14159
#define D 1009
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 

int64 score[45];
int req,n;
map<int64,int64>m1,m2;
int limit;
void go1(int idx,int64 cur){
	if(idx==limit){
		m1[cur]++;
		return;
	}
	go1(idx+1,cur);
	go1(idx+1,cur+score[idx]);
}

void go2(int idx,int cur){
	if(idx==n){
		m2[cur]++;
		return;
	}
	go2(idx+1,cur);
	go2(idx+1,cur+score[idx]);
}

int64 comb(){
	int64 ret=0;
	map<int64,int64>::iterator it;
	for(it=m1.begin();it!=m1.end();it++){
		if(it->first>req)
		break;
		if(m2.count(req-it->first)){
			ret+=it->second*m2[req-it->first];
		}
	}
	return ret;
}

int main(){
	int i;
	cin>>n>>req;
	limit=(n/2);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>score[i];
	go1(0,0);
	go2(limit,0);
	cout<<comb()<<endl;
	return 0;
}
